DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether perform extend delayed cord clamp term neonate require resuscitation improve early transition compare short-delayed cord clamping .
DOC.brief_title: Short-Delay Cord Clamping Compared Extended- Delay Cord Clamping Term Neonates That Require Resuscitation .
DOC.detailed_description: All subject receive delay cord clamp . One group ( short-delay ) receive one minute delay cord clamp place either mother 's abdomen life-start trolley extensive resuscitation require . The second group receive delay cord clamp least 5 minute continue baby establish breathe without additional support stable respiratory support ( longer receive mask PPV least 1-2 minute , i.e . stable CPAP intubate ) . The subject initially place mother 's abdomen subject need extensive resuscitation move LifeStart bed receive resuscitation measure . In either group baby deem unstable ( medical team ) life-start trolley cord clamp baby move adjacent warmer resuscitation .
DOC.criteria: Gestation 37 week great require attendance delivery neonatal provider due risk delivery . Planned cesarean birth , placental abruption , multiple gestation , know congenital anomaly .
